parameters: Hi, welcome to the Nouns auction! One noun per
Everyday, we auction off one Noun to the
highest bidder. Whoever wins, gets a Noun, and
gets the ability to vote on proposals!
What would you like to do?
This is Noun 875, the noun for Oct 11, 2023.
Current High Bid = 20.10 ETH by fugazi.eth
What would you like to bid, in ETH? Use the
decimal point for any decimal values.

Your bid is less than or equal to the current
bid. Please adjust it to be greater than the
Your bid is \N[2] ETH. Would you like to
Success! Your bid has been placed. Good luck!
OK, if you want to submit a bid, talk to me
